title: A 'Nobel' question
content:
I'm curious...does anyone know if there's actually a difference between Font Bureau's Nobel and Dutch Type Library's Nobel?

I gather they're similar but not the same... maybe someone can enlighten me on the differences? (if any?)
author: Yehan

comments.content: There are many subtle differences, the most obvious being that DTL's A, M, N, V have pointed apexes throughout the weights. I prefer this, but it does make the design more mannered and less neutral.
